titles.title: Common Sense in Sentencing Act of 2009
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prevent unjust and irrational criminal punishments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 6/18/2009--Introduced. Common Sense in Sentencing Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to authorize a federal court to impose a sentence below a statutory minimum if necessary to avoid violating federal provisions prescribing factors courts must consider in imposing a sentence.
